Reference

All functions

accumulate_runoff(<instant>)

Compute instantaneous flow for each timestep

accumulate_runoff(<muskingum>)

Implements 'muskingum' routing algorithm for vector river network

accumulate_runoff()

Apply river routing based on selected routing method.

accumulate_runoff(<simple>)

Implements a simple lagged river routing algorithm.

add_HSgrid()

Combine HSgrid objects or addnew runoff input from raster.

basin

Area of Interest polygon

compute_area_weights()

Compute weights for river catchment areas within the runoff area features.

compute_HSweights()

Computes weights to assign runoff from runoff area features to the supplied river network.

compute_river_weights()

Compute weights for river segments within runoff area features.

create_HSgrid()

Constructs a HSgrid object from given input

create_HSobs()

Constructor for HSobs object

create_HSweights()

Creates a HSweights object

delineate_basin()

Delineate multiple catchments from multiple input points

downscale_runoff()

Computes specific runoff generated in the river segment.

ensemble_summary()

Computes summaries from hydrostreamer::HS* objects

flow_gof()

Computed goodness-of-fit statistics for discharge predictions against observed streamflow

HSwrite()

Writes any HS* object as a single geopackage where each input runoff is written as it's own layer.

hydrostreamer

hydrostreamer: A package for downscaling distributed runoff products in to explicit river segments.

optimise_point()

Computes optimal estimate from multiple input discharge timeseries

optimise_region()

Computes and regionalizes optimal estimate from multiple discharge timeseries against observed streamflow

raster_to_HSgrid()

Polygonizes a raster and adds cell values as attribute columns to an 'sf' polygon object.

river

Example river network

river_hierarchy()

Computes river hierarchies for a HSnetwork object.

river_network()

Generates neighbour information from a connected, directed river network.

river_outlets()

Identify locations from where to start catchment delineation.

river_voronoi()

Create a segment-specific Voronoi diagram from an sf LINESTRING object.

split_river_with_grid()

Split river segments at runoff unit (polygon) boundaries.

upstream()

Find all upstream segments from a specified river segment.
